sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The while loop executes a set of statements as long as a the test condition remains true. The syntax of a while loop is while test_expression statements end Note that a conditional expression is considered true if the real part of the result of the expression contains any non-zero elements (this strange convention is adopted for compatibility with MATLAB).
